mapper.select: select id,pid as pId,simplename as name, ( CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen from sys_dept

select * from sys_dept
where simplename like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or fullname like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
order by num ASC

select d.id, d.num, d.pid, d.pids, d.simplename, d.fullname, d.tips, d.version, d.attend_times, d.start_work_time, d.end_work_time, d.start_rest_time, d.end_rest_time, d.leave_time, d.start_over_time, d.email1, d.email2, d.email3, d.send_email_cycle, d.work_day from sys_dept d, sys_user u where u.deptid=d.id and u.account = #{userId}
mapper.update: update sys_dept set attend_times = #{attendTimes}, start_work_time = #{startWorkTime}, end_work_time = #{endWorkTime}, start_rest_time = #{startRestTime}, end_rest_time = #{endRestTime}, leave_time = #{leaveTime}, start_over_time = #{startOverTime}, email1 = #{email1}, email2 = #{email2}, email3 = #{email3}, send_email_cycle= #{sendEmailCycle}, work_day = #{workDay} where pids like CONCAT('%',#{deptId},'%')
mapper.select: select d.id, d.num, d.pid, d.pids, d.simplename, d.fullname, d.tips, d.version, d.attend_times, d.start_work_time, d.end_work_time, d.start_rest_time, d.end_rest_time, d.leave_time, d.start_over_time, d.email1, d.email2, d.email3, d.send_email_cycle, d.work_day from sys_dept d where send_email_cycle=#{cycle} and (email1 is not null or email2 is not null or email3 is not null)
